casebody.data:
SATICOY BAY LLC, Series 2920 Bayliner Avenue, Appellant,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Successor to JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., as Trustee for the Holders of the MLMI Surf Trust, Mortgage Loan Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2005-BC4, Respondent. No. 73594 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 13, 2018

AFFIRMED.
